text: Isolation of PBMCs , <extra_id_0> CD4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + T cells , and culture conditions .

Human PBMCs were isolated by Ficoll ( Biochrom ) density gradient centrifugation and <extra_id_0> CD4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + T cells were then isolated using the Dynal <extra_id_0> CD4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + Isolation <extra_id_0> kit <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( Invitrogen ) according to the manufacturer 's instructions .
The purity of <extra_id_0> CD4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + T cells was initially tested by flow cytometry and was > =95 % .

Cells were stimulated with the following combination of mAbs to T cell surface molecules ( Meiler et al . , 2008 ) : anti - <extra_id_0> CD2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( clone 4B2 and 6G4 ; 0.5 microg / ml ) , anti - <extra_id_0> CD3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( clone OKT3 ; 0.5 microg / ml ) , and anti - <extra_id_0> CD28 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mAb ( clone B7G5 ; 0.5 microg / ml ; all from Sanquin ) and cultured in serum-free AIM-V medium ( Life Technologies ) with the addition of 1 nmol / liter <extra_id_0> IL-2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( Roche ) .
<extra_id_0> TGF-beta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( R & D Systems ) was used at 5 ng / ml , if not stated otherwise .
A combination of PMA ( 25 ng / ml ) and ionomycin ( 1 mg / ml ; Sigma-Aldrich ) was used .

Mouse naive ( <extra_id_0> CD62L <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> hi <extra_id_0> 44 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> lo <extra_id_0> 25 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - ) <extra_id_0> CD4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + T cells were purified by flow cytometry and activated in vitro with 5 microg / ml plate - bound anti - <extra_id_0> CD3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and 1 microg / ml soluble anti - <extra_id_0> CD28 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> antibodies ( eBioscience ) in RPMI supplemented with 10 % FCS , 5 mM beta-mercaptoethanol , and antibiotics .
